definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="222" y="49"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_tree_cherry"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="foliage_height">6</field><field name="base_height">3</field><field name="height_variation_a">3</field><field name="height_variation_b">2</field><field name="hanging_leaves_chance">0.5</field><field name="hanging_leaves_extension_chance">0.5</field><field name="corner_hole_chance">0.5</field><field name="bottom_hole_chance">0.5</field><field name="force_dirt">FALSE</field><field name="ignore_vines">TRUE</field><value name="dirt"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.AIR</field></block></value><value name="trunk"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Very_dark_oakLog</field></block></value><value name="foliage"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Very_dark_oakLeaves</field></block></value><value name="root_placer"><block type="root_placer_none"></block></value><value name="branch_count"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">3</field><field name="max">3</field></block></value><value name="branch_length"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">5</field><field name="max">10</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_count"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We try to generate this feature twice in each chunk</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">2</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="83" w="182">We then move each patch horizontally. This way they don't generate only in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">MOTION_BLOCKING</field><comment pinned="false" h="92" w="165">We then move the patches at the highest motion blocking block, so that they generate on the surface</comment><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We add a biome filter, so that the patches don't generate outside of the current biome</comment></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
